
{{Client function}}

{{New feature/item|3.0150|1.5.0|7048|
This function returns the color for a [[/Element/Light.md|light]] element.
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int, int, int getLightColor ( light theLight )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/light.md|light]]:getColor|color|setLightColor}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theLight:''' The [[/Element/Light.md|light]] that you wish to retrieve the color of.

=== Returns ===
Returns three [[/int.md|int]]s corresponding to the amount of red, green and blue (respectively) of the light, ''false'' if invalid arguments were passed.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="Lua">
local light = createLight(0, 0, 0, 4)
local red, green, blue = getLightColor(light)
outputChatBox(" light color is " .. red .. ", " .. green .. ", " .. blue)
</syntaxhighlight>
